hadith.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed that:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to go out on the day of 'Eid and pray two rak'ahs, then he would deliver the Khutbah and enjoin giving charity, and the ones who gave most charity were the women. If he had any exigency or he needed to send an army he would speak of that, if not, he would go back
